General.Name: Alamar Foods CJSC
General.Description: Alamar Foods Company operates as a franchisee and operator of Domino's Pizza and Dunkin' Donuts in the MENA region. Alamar Foods Company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Alamar Foods Company is a subsidiary of Abdul Aziz Ibrahim Al Jammaz and Brothers Company.
General.Address: Prince Sultan bin Abdulaziz Street, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11412
